events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates, and I am very concerned about the delay.
The reported problem involves late shipping and delay in delivery, so the case is categorized under Delivery Delay for further handling.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle your delivery delay issue and will get back to you shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll do my best to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking code you have? This will help me check the status more effectively.
Sure, my order number is 5623789 and the tracking code is TRK123456789. I’ve checked the website multiple times but there’s no update.
Thank you for the details. I’ve contacted the courier service for an update. It appears there was a processing delay. We expect your package to arrive within 3 business days.
I appreciate you checking with the courier. I hope the package arrives soon, but this delay has been quite inconvenient for me.
We have confirmed your package was delivered today. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Just following up to ensure you received your order and that everything is in good condition. We are here if you need further help.
As the delivery issue has been resolved and confirmed, this case will be closed now. Thank you for your patience.
